text: Jaime de Armiñán Oliver (9 March 1927 - 9 April 2024) was a Spanish screenwriter and movie director. His movies were nominated for Academy Awards in the Foreign language movie category twice, in 1972 for Mi querida señorita and in 1980 for El Nido. Armiñán died on 9 April 2024 in Madrid, Spain, one month after his 97th birthday.Muere el cineasta Jaime de Armiñán a los 97 años ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Writers from Madrid
title: Jaime de Armiñán
